item.description:
It's time to have a real Spring party. The Boston Cyberarts Festival is coming up, and we should prepare something great in its honor. Come hang out at Asmara to brainstorm, make merry, and celebrate new life.

Also on the agenda: Wikimania, research proposals (Wikidemia), Wikicite, and photographs of excellent Ethiopian food.

For more information, see en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia:Meetup/Boston
item.name: Post-Ides party planning
